RESTAURANT

Restaurant is the premiere fine-dining restaurant in

the historic city center of Cusco. We offer a unique

experience defined by distinctive Peruvian flavors

and influenced by the traditional French cooking

style. At Restaurant, we value your taste buds.

VISIT US

Restaurant is open for dinner from Monday
through Saturday and is closed on Sundays.
We hae both indoor and outdoor seating.
Masks are required indoors.
We advise making a reservation.
We look forward to seeing you.

555 Ave. Imaginaria, Cusco, Peru
